question: During what time of year did Janie and Tea Cake travel down to the muck?
answer: Janie and Tea Cake traveled to the muck (the Everglades) in September, arriving before the bean-picking season officially opened in late September. They came early to secure a room with a bath before the crowds of migrant workers arrived.
quote: Season don't open up till last of September, but we had tuh git heah ahead uh time tuh git us uh room. Two weeks from now, it'll be so many folks heah dey won't be lookin' fuh rooms, dey'll be jus' looking fuh somewhere tuh sleep.
